description: A whimsical tale about a mountain's winter attire.
title: Monty Mountain's Snowcap
n_1: Monty Mountain stands tall, covered in a layer of snow.
n_2: Hiker Hannah looks up in awe at Monty's snowy peak.
n_3: Monty basks in the winter sun, snowcap glistening.
n_4: Hiker Hannah continues her trek, admiring Monty's snowy attire.
c2_4: Thanks, Monty! See you next season!
